body: $PQEFF In 2005
created_at: Doyle Brunson submitted an unsolicited offer to buy WPT Enterprises Inc.
column3: at a high premium to its then share price.

body: Shortly after
created_at: a PR firm hired by Brunson announced the offer. The publication of the offer led to a steep increase in the price of the stock. When pressed for details
column3: he and his team stopped responding.

body: As the unresponsiveness continued
created_at: the share price steadily fell until the offer expired. Investors lost tens of millions.

body: When later questioned by the SEC
column3: told his lawyers to withhold documents

body: 2 years later the SEC dropped the case. Nothing happened to Brunson
created_at: a well known public figure in the US.
